alps.title: Learning Management System (LMS)
alps.doc: A comprehensive ALPS (Application-Level Profile Semantics) profile that defines the complete semantic vocabulary and interaction model for an enterprise-grade Learning Management System. This specification covers all aspects of online education including user management (students, instructors, administrators), course creation and delivery, content management, assessments, grading, communication tools, collaboration features, analytics, and accessibility. The profile is organized into semantic descriptors, state transitions, and navigation patterns to support standardized implementation and interoperability across educational technology platforms.

descriptor.title: User
descriptor.doc: Represents a person who interacts with the Learning Management System. Users can have different roles including student, instructor, or administrator. Each user has a unique identifier, personal details, and system preferences.

descriptor.title: User Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the user, typically an alphanumeric string that serves as the primary key in the database.

descriptor.title: User Name
descriptor.doc: The full name of the user, typically comprising first name and last name. Used for display purposes throughout the system.

descriptor.title: User Email
descriptor.doc: The email address associated with the user account. Used for system notifications, password recovery, and as the username for login.

descriptor.title: User Password
descriptor.doc: The password for user authentication. Should be stored using strong encryption algorithms and subject to complexity requirements.

descriptor.title: User Role
descriptor.doc: Defines the permissions and access level of the user within the system. Common roles include student, instructor, and administrator.

descriptor.title: User Preferences
descriptor.doc: User-specific settings including interface preferences, notification settings, and accessibility options that customize the user experience.

descriptor.title: Student
descriptor.doc: Individual who registers for courses, accesses content, and submits assignments. The primary consumer of educational content who enrolls in courses, completes assignments, participates in discussions, and receives grades.

descriptor.title: Enrolled Courses
descriptor.doc: The collection of courses in which the student is currently enrolled. Includes active, completed, and upcoming courses.

descriptor.title: Learning Progress
descriptor.doc: Metrics and indicators that track the student's advancement through course materials, including completion status of content items, modules, and assessments.

descriptor.title: Student Grades
descriptor.doc: Collection of evaluation scores received by the student for assignments, quizzes, exams, and participation across all enrolled courses.

descriptor.title: Instructor
descriptor.doc: Educator who creates and manages courses, evaluates student progress. Responsible for developing course content, designing assessments, facilitating discussions, and evaluating student performance.

descriptor.title: Courses Taught
descriptor.doc: Collection of courses created or taught by the instructor, including current, past, and planned courses.

descriptor.title: Areas of Expertise
descriptor.doc: Subject areas and disciplines in which the instructor specializes, used for instructor discovery and course categorization.

descriptor.title: Administrator
descriptor.doc: Person who oversees the entire system, manages user accounts and course catalog. Has elevated privileges to configure system settings, manage users, and generate institutional reports.

descriptor.title: Administrative Permissions
descriptor.doc: Specific system capabilities assigned to the administrator, which may include user management, course approval, analytics access, and system configuration options.

descriptor.title: Course
descriptor.doc: The primary unit of instruction within the LMS. A structured educational experience with defined learning objectives, content modules, assessments, and timeline. Courses are created by instructors and taken by students.

descriptor.title: Course Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the course, used as a reference key throughout the system.

descriptor.title: Course Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the course as displayed in the catalog and to enrolled users. Should be descriptive and specific.

descriptor.title: Course Description
descriptor.doc: An extended explanation of the course content, learning objectives, and expected outcomes. Displayed to potential students during course discovery and selection.

descriptor.title: Course Category
descriptor.doc: The subject category or discipline to which the course belongs, used for organization and discovery within the course catalog.

descriptor.title: Start Date
descriptor.doc: The date when the course becomes available to enrolled students, marking the beginning of the learning period.

descriptor.title: End Date
descriptor.doc: The date when the course closes, after which new submissions may not be accepted and course content may become inaccessible.

descriptor.title: Enrollment Capacity
descriptor.doc: The maximum number of students who can enroll in the course. Used to manage class size and resource allocation.

descriptor.title: Difficulty Level
descriptor.doc: An indicator of the course's complexity and required prior knowledge, such as introductory, intermediate, advanced, or expert.

descriptor.title: Course Status
descriptor.doc: The current state of the course in its lifecycle, which may include draft, published, in-progress, completed, or archived.

descriptor.title: Prerequisites
descriptor.doc: Other courses or qualifications that students should complete before enrolling in this course, ensuring appropriate preparation.

descriptor.title: Course Module
descriptor.doc: Section of a course to organize content in logical order. A thematic unit within a course that groups related content items, activities, and assessments into a cohesive learning sequence.

descriptor.title: Module Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the module, used for reference within the system and to track completion status.

descriptor.title: Module Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the module as displayed to users, indicating the subject matter or themes covered.

descriptor.title: Module Description
descriptor.doc: A summary of the module's learning objectives, content, and activities, helping students understand its purpose and structure.

descriptor.title: Module Order
descriptor.doc: The sequence number that determines the module's position within the course structure, defining the recommended learning path.

descriptor.title: Course Content
descriptor.doc: Teaching materials in various formats. Educational resources used for instruction, including text, multimedia, interactive activities, and downloadable files.

descriptor.title: Content Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the content item, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Content Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the content item as displayed to users, indicating its subject or purpose.

descriptor.title: Content Description
descriptor.doc: A summary of the content's purpose, format, and learning objectives, helping students understand its relevance.

descriptor.title: Content Type
descriptor.doc: The format of the content, such as text, video, audio, presentation, interactive simulation, or downloadable file.

descriptor.title: Content Data
descriptor.doc: The actual content material, which may be embedded within the system or linked from external sources.

descriptor.title: Content Status
descriptor.doc: Draft or published
The current state of the content item, indicating whether it is in development (draft) or available to students (published).

descriptor.title: Content Accessibility Features
descriptor.doc: Accommodations and design elements that ensure content is usable by students with disabilities, such as alt text, captions, or screen reader compatibility.

descriptor.title: Assignment
descriptor.doc: Task assigned to students to assess learning. An evaluation activity that requires students to demonstrate knowledge, skills, or competencies related to course objectives.

descriptor.title: Assignment Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the assignment, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Assignment Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the assignment as displayed to users, indicating its subject or purpose.

descriptor.title: Assignment Description
descriptor.doc: Detailed instructions for completing the assignment, including requirements, format, and evaluation criteria.

descriptor.title: Assignment Type
descriptor.doc: The category of assessment, such as essay, quiz, exam, project, discussion, or practical exercise.

descriptor.title: Due Date
descriptor.doc: The deadline by which students must submit their work, after which late penalties may apply or submissions may be rejected.

descriptor.title: Maximum Score
descriptor.doc: The highest possible points or grade that can be earned for the assignment, establishing the scoring scale.

descriptor.title: Weightage in Overall Grade
descriptor.doc: The percentage or proportion of the final course grade determined by this assignment.

descriptor.title: Assignment Submission
descriptor.doc: Student's response to an assignment. The work provided by a student in fulfillment of an assignment's requirements, which may include text, files, or other digital artifacts.

descriptor.title: Submission Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the submission, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Submission Content
descriptor.doc: The actual work submitted by the student, which may include text entries, uploaded files, or links to external resources.

descriptor.title: Submission Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the submission was received by the system, used to verify timeliness relative to deadlines.

descriptor.title: Submission Status
descriptor.doc: The current state of the submission in the grading workflow, such as submitted, under review, graded, or returned for revision.

descriptor.title: Grade
descriptor.doc: Evaluation of a student's submission. An assessment of the quality, correctness, or achievement level of a student's work on an assignment.

descriptor.title: Grade Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the grade record, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Grade Value
descriptor.doc: The score or evaluation assigned to the submission, which may be numeric, letter-based, or categorical (pass/fail).

descriptor.title: Feedback
descriptor.doc: Comments, corrections, and guidance provided by the instructor to help the student understand the evaluation and improve future work.

descriptor.title: Graded Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the grade was assigned, used for tracking grading timelines and notification purposes.

descriptor.title: Grading Rubric
descriptor.doc: Criteria for evaluating student work. A structured scoring tool that defines performance expectations across multiple dimensions of an assignment.

descriptor.title: Rubric Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the rubric, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Rubric Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the rubric as displayed to users, often indicating the assignment or type of assessment it supports.

descriptor.title: Rubric Criteria
descriptor.doc: The specific dimensions and performance levels used for evaluation, with descriptions of expectations at each level.

descriptor.title: Discussion Forum
descriptor.doc: Platform for questions and answers. An interactive space where course participants can engage in threaded conversations about course topics or ask questions.

descriptor.title: Discussion Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the discussion forum, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Discussion Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the discussion forum as displayed to users, indicating its topic or purpose.

descriptor.title: Discussion Description
descriptor.doc: An explanation of the forum's purpose, guidelines, and expectations for participation.

descriptor.title: Discussion Posts
descriptor.doc: The collection of messages contributed to the discussion by participants, organized in chronological or threaded format.

descriptor.title: Discussion Post
descriptor.doc: Message in a discussion forum. A contribution to a discussion forum that may initiate a new thread or respond to an existing message.

descriptor.title: Post Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the post, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Post Content
descriptor.doc: The text of the message, which may include formatting, links, or embedded media.

descriptor.title: Post Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the post was created, used for chronological organization and activity tracking.

descriptor.title: Post Author
descriptor.doc: The user who created the post, displayed alongside the content for attribution.

descriptor.title: Post Replies
descriptor.doc: Responses to the post from other users, creating a nested conversation thread.

descriptor.title: Notification
descriptor.doc: System message to inform users. An automatic communication from the LMS to alert users about relevant events, deadlines, or updates.

descriptor.title: Notification Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the notification, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Notification Content
descriptor.doc: The message body of the notification, explaining the event or information being communicated.

descriptor.title: Notification Type
descriptor.doc: The category of notification, such as announcement, deadline reminder, grade posting, or system alert.

descriptor.title: Notification Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the notification was generated, used for chronological organization.

descriptor.title: Notification Status
descriptor.doc: The current state of the notification, such as unread, read, or dismissed, tracking user interaction.

descriptor.title: Direct Message
descriptor.doc: Private communication between users. A confidential exchange between specific system users, not visible to others.

descriptor.title: Message Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the message, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Message Content
descriptor.doc: The text of the message, which may include formatting, links, or embedded media.

descriptor.title: Message Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the message was sent, used for chronological organization.

descriptor.title: Message Sender
descriptor.doc: The user who initiated the message, displayed for attribution.

descriptor.title: Message Recipient
descriptor.doc: The user or users designated to receive the message, controlling its visibility.

descriptor.title: Message Attachments
descriptor.doc: Files or references included with the message, such as documents, images, or links.

descriptor.title: Student Group
descriptor.doc: Collection of students for collaboration. A defined subset of course participants who work together on assignments or activities.

descriptor.title: Group Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the group, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Group Name
descriptor.doc: The name of the group as displayed to users, often chosen by members or assigned by instructors.

descriptor.title: Group Members
descriptor.doc: The collection of students assigned to the group, who can collaborate on shared activities.

descriptor.title: Shared Workspace
descriptor.doc: A dedicated area where group members can communicate, share files, and collaborate on activities privately within the group.

descriptor.title: Online Session
descriptor.doc: Real-time virtual class session. A scheduled live event where instructors and students interact simultaneously through video, audio, chat, or shared screens.

descriptor.title: Webinar Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the webinar, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Webinar Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the webinar as displayed to users, indicating its topic or purpose.

descriptor.title: Webinar Description
descriptor.doc: An explanation of the webinar's content, objectives, and participation requirements.

descriptor.title: Webinar Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the webinar will begin, used for scheduling and reminders.

descriptor.title: Webinar Duration
descriptor.doc: The expected length of the session, helping participants plan their attendance.

descriptor.title: Webinar URL
descriptor.doc: The web address for joining the online session, which may link to a video conferencing platform.

descriptor.title: Webinar Recording
descriptor.doc: A captured video of the session made available for later viewing by those who couldn't attend live or want to review.

descriptor.title: User Analytics
descriptor.doc: Data on user engagement and activity. Metrics that track how users interact with the system, providing insights into learning behaviors and platform usage.

descriptor.title: Login Frequency
descriptor.doc: How often users access the system, measured as logins per time period, indicating engagement levels.

descriptor.title: Content Viewed
descriptor.doc: Records of which content items users have accessed, tracking exposure to course materials.

descriptor.title: Time Spent on Platform
descriptor.doc: Duration of user sessions, measured in minutes or hours, indicating depth of engagement.

descriptor.title: Time to Complete Assignments
descriptor.doc: How long users take to finish assignments, measured from first view to submission, indicating effort levels.

descriptor.title: System Report
descriptor.doc: Aggregated data for analysis. A structured compilation of system data organized for specific analysis purposes, often used by administrators for decision-making.

descriptor.title: Report Identifier
descriptor.doc: A unique identifier for the report, used for reference and tracking within the system.

descriptor.title: Report Title
descriptor.doc: The name of the report as displayed to users, indicating its content or purpose.

descriptor.title: Report Type
descriptor.doc: The category of report, such as usage statistics, grade distribution, completion rates, or financial summary.

descriptor.title: Report Data
descriptor.doc: The actual information contained in the report, which may include tables, charts, or raw data exports.

descriptor.title: Report Generation Date
descriptor.doc: The date and time when the report was created, important for temporal context of the data.

descriptor.title: Interface Language
descriptor.doc: The selected language for system text and communications, allowing users to interact with the LMS in their preferred language.

descriptor.title: Accessibility Feature
descriptor.doc: Functions that improve usability for users with disabilities, such as screen reader support, keyboard navigation, high contrast modes, or text resizing options.

descriptor.title: Offline Content
descriptor.doc: Downloaded content for access without internet. Course materials that have been saved locally to a device for use when connectivity is limited or unavailable.
Course materials that students can download to their devices for viewing without an active internet connection, supporting learning in low-connectivity situations.

descriptor.title: Home Page
descriptor.doc: System landing page. The primary entry point for authenticated users, displaying personalized navigation, notifications, and activity summaries.

descriptor.title: Login Page
descriptor.doc: The entry point for user authentication where existing users provide credentials to access the system.

descriptor.title: Registration Page
descriptor.doc: The interface where new users create accounts by providing personal information and selecting their role within the system.

descriptor.title: User Profile Page
descriptor.doc: The interface where users can view and edit their personal information, preferences, and system settings.

descriptor.title: User Management Page
descriptor.doc: An administrative interface that displays all system users and provides tools for account management and permission assignment.

descriptor.title: User Details Page
descriptor.doc: An administrative interface that displays comprehensive information about a specific user, including their permissions and activity history.

descriptor.title: Course Listing Page
descriptor.doc: An interface that displays available courses, with filtering and sorting options to help users discover relevant educational opportunities.

descriptor.title: Course Details Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific course, displaying its structure, content, activities, and participant information.

descriptor.title: Course Creation Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where instructors define new courses by specifying details, structure, and settings before publishing to the catalog.

descriptor.title: Course Edit Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where instructors modify existing courses, updating content, structure, or settings as needed.

descriptor.title: Course Modules Page
descriptor.doc: An interface that displays all modules within a course, showing their sequence and allowing for management operations.

descriptor.title: Module Details Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific module, displaying its content items, structure, and allowing for management operations.

descriptor.title: Content Creation Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where instructors create educational materials by selecting content types and creating or uploading learning resources.

descriptor.title: Content Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific content item, displaying its details and allowing for management operations such as editing or removal.

descriptor.title: Enrolled Courses Page
descriptor.doc: A personalized view for students showing all courses they are currently registered for, with status indicators and navigation options.

descriptor.title: Learning Progress Dashboard
descriptor.doc: A visual display of a student's advancement through course materials, showing completion status, scores, and time spent across modules.

descriptor.title: Class Progress Dashboard
descriptor.doc: An overview for instructors showing all students' advancement and performance in a course, highlighting areas of success or concern.

descriptor.title: Individual Student Progress
descriptor.doc: A detailed view for instructors of a specific student's performance and engagement across all course activities and assessments.

descriptor.title: Course Assignments Page
descriptor.doc: A listing of all evaluation activities for a course, organized chronologically or by type, with status indicators and management options.

descriptor.title: Assignment Creation Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where instructors define new evaluation activities by specifying requirements, due dates, and grading criteria.

descriptor.title: Assignment Details Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific assignment, showing its requirements, deadlines, submission status, and available actions.

descriptor.title: Assignment Submissions Page
descriptor.doc: A listing for instructors of all student responses to an assignment, showing submission status, timestamps, and grading progress.

descriptor.title: Submission Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific student's assignment response, with tools for evaluation, feedback, and grade assignment.

descriptor.title: Course Gradebook
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive record of all student evaluations for a course, showing scores across assignments and calculated overall grades.

descriptor.title: Course Discussions Page
descriptor.doc: A listing of all conversation forums for a course, organized by topic or activity level, with creation and participation options.

descriptor.title: Discussion Thread Page
descriptor.doc: A view of a specific conversation forum, showing all posts in threaded or chronological order with tools for participation.

descriptor.title: External System
descriptor.doc: Represents an external system or URL outside the LMS. A connection point to third-party tools, resources, or platforms that integrate with the learning system.
A reference to services outside the LMS that have been integrated for functions like video conferencing, specialized simulations, or external content repositories.

descriptor.title: Create Announcement Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where instructors compose system messages to be broadcast to all course participants, with options for timing and distribution.

descriptor.title: Messaging Center
descriptor.doc: A unified inbox for personal communications within the system, showing messages exchanged with other users in conversation threads.

descriptor.title: Message Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A view of a specific message exchange, showing the conversation history and providing tools for response and attachment handling.

descriptor.title: Group Management Page
descriptor.doc: An interface for creating and organizing student teams within a course, with tools for membership assignment and workspace configuration.

descriptor.title: Group Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific student team, showing its members, shared resources, and collaboration spaces with management options.

descriptor.title: Webinar Schedule Page
descriptor.doc: A calendar view of planned live sessions for a course, with creation, management, and participation options for virtual meetings.

descriptor.title: Webinar Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific live session, showing its details, participation link, and recording access with relevant actions.

descriptor.title: Analytics Dashboard
descriptor.doc: A visual presentation of engagement and performance data for a course, helping instructors identify patterns and make informed decisions.

descriptor.title: Reporting Center
descriptor.doc: An administrative interface for generating, viewing, and exporting system-wide data compilations for institutional analysis and reporting.

descriptor.title: Report Detail Page
descriptor.doc: A comprehensive view of a specific data compilation, showing its contents in tabular, graphical, or downloadable formats.

descriptor.title: User Settings Page
descriptor.doc: An interface where users configure their system preferences, including language, notifications, and accessibility accommodations.

descriptor.title: Webinar Viewing Page
descriptor.doc: The interface where users actively participate in a live session, with video, audio, chat, and interactive elements for real-time engagement.

descriptor.title: Recording Viewing Page
descriptor.doc: The interface where users play back captured sessions, with playback controls and navigation options for asynchronous viewing.

descriptor.title: Mobile Application State
descriptor.doc: The interface optimized for smartphone or tablet access, with adaptations for smaller screens and touch interaction plus offline capabilities.

descriptor.title: Login to System
descriptor.doc: Validates user credentials and, if successful, provides access to the system by creating an authenticated session.

descriptor.title: Register New User
descriptor.doc: Creates a new user account in the system based on provided information, sending verification if required by policy.

descriptor.title: Reset Password
descriptor.doc: Initiates the password recovery process by sending instructions to the user's registered email address.

descriptor.title: Logout from System
descriptor.doc: Terminates the user's active session, requiring re-authentication for further system access.

descriptor.title: Go to Home Page
descriptor.doc: Redirects the user to their personalized dashboard, the primary entry point after authentication.

descriptor.title: Go to Login Page
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the authentication screen where they can provide credentials for system access.

descriptor.title: Go to Registration Page
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the account creation screen where new users can set up their system identity.

descriptor.title: Go to Settings Page
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the interface where they can customize their system preferences and configurations.

descriptor.title: Go to Report Center
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the administrative interface for generating and viewing system-wide data reports.

descriptor.title: Go to Progress Dashboard
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the visual display of their course advancement and performance statistics.

descriptor.title: Go to Analytics Dashboard
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the data visualization interface showing engagement and performance metrics for a course.

descriptor.title: Go to Announcement Creation
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for composing and distributing messages to all course participants.

descriptor.title: Go to Gradebook
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the comprehensive record of all student evaluations and calculated grades for a course.

descriptor.title: Go to Report Detail
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific data compilation, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View User Profile
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the interface displaying their personal information and account settings.

descriptor.title: View User List
descriptor.doc: Directs the administrator to the interface displaying all system users with management options.

descriptor.title: View User Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the administrator to the comprehensive view of a specific user's account, identified by their unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Course List
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the catalog of available courses with discovery and filtering options.

descriptor.title: View Course Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific course, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: Go to Course Creation
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for defining and configuring a new educational offering.

descriptor.title: Go to Course Edit
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for modifying an existing course's details and structure.

descriptor.title: View Module List
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the listing of all thematic sections within a specific course.

descriptor.title: View Module Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific thematic section, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: Go to Content Creation
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for producing new educational materials to be included in a module.

descriptor.title: View Content Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific educational resource, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Enrolled Courses
descriptor.doc: Directs the student to the personalized listing of courses they have registered for.

descriptor.title: View Assignment List
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the listing of all evaluation activities for a specific course.

descriptor.title: Go to Assignment Creation
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for defining a new evaluation activity for students.

descriptor.title: View Assignment Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific evaluation activity, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Submission List
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the listing of all student responses to a specific assignment.

descriptor.title: View Submission Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific student's assignment response, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Discussion List
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the listing of all conversation forums for a specific course.

descriptor.title: View Discussion Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the view of a specific conversation forum, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: Go to Discussion Creation
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the interface for starting a new conversation topic within a course.

descriptor.title: Go to Message Center
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to their unified inbox for personal communications within the system.

descriptor.title: Go to Create Message
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the interface for composing a new personal communication to another system user.

descriptor.title: View Message Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the view of a specific message exchange, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: Go to Group Management
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the interface for creating and organizing student teams within a course.

descriptor.title: View Group Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific student team, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Webinar Schedule
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the calendar of planned live sessions for a specific course.

descriptor.title: View Webinar Details
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the comprehensive view of a specific live session, identified by its unique reference.

descriptor.title: View Notifications
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the listing of system messages and alerts generated by events and updates.

descriptor.title: View Class Progress
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the overview of all students' advancement and performance in a specific course.

descriptor.title: View Student Progress
descriptor.doc: Directs the instructor to the detailed view of a specific student's performance in a course, identified by both course and user references.

descriptor.title: Create New Course
descriptor.doc: Generates a new educational offering in the system based on instructor-provided details and configuration settings.

descriptor.title: Update Course
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing course's details, structure, or settings based on instructor inputs, preserving its identity and enrollment.

descriptor.title: Delete Course
descriptor.doc: Removes a course from the active catalog, potentially archiving its content and enrollment history for record-keeping.

descriptor.title: Create Course Module
descriptor.doc: Generates a new thematic section within a course, establishing its place in the learning sequence and container for content.

descriptor.title: Update Module
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing module's details, description, or sequence position within its parent course.

descriptor.title: Delete Module
descriptor.doc: Removes a thematic section from a course, potentially affecting its content items and the course's overall structure.

descriptor.title: Create Content
descriptor.doc: Generates a new educational resource within a module, establishing its format, accessibility features, and learning material.

descriptor.title: Update Content
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing educational resource's details, material, or accessibility features while maintaining its position in the course structure.

descriptor.title: Delete Content
descriptor.doc: Removes an educational resource from its parent module, affecting the module's completeness and potentially student progress tracking.

descriptor.title: Save Course as Draft
descriptor.doc: Preserves the current state of a course in development without making it visible to students or available for enrollment.

descriptor.title: Save Content as Draft
descriptor.doc: Preserves the current state of an educational resource in development without publishing it to students in the module.

descriptor.title: Preview Content
descriptor.doc: Displays an educational resource as it will appear to students, allowing instructors to verify its presentation before publishing.

descriptor.title: Publish Course
descriptor.doc: Makes a course visible in the catalog and available for enrollment, transitioning it from draft to active status.

descriptor.title: Enroll in Course
descriptor.doc: Registers a student for a specific course, granting access to its materials and adding it to their enrolled courses list.

descriptor.title: Unenroll from Course
descriptor.doc: Removes a student's registration from a course, potentially affecting their access to materials and progress records.

descriptor.title: Extend Deadline
descriptor.doc: Grants a specific student additional time for course completion beyond the standard end date, accommodating special circumstances.

descriptor.title: Create Assignment
descriptor.doc: Generates a new evaluation activity within a course, establishing its requirements, deadlines, and assessment parameters.

descriptor.title: Update Assignment
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing evaluation activity's details, requirements, or parameters while maintaining its identity and submissions.

descriptor.title: Delete Assignment
descriptor.doc: Removes an evaluation activity from a course, potentially affecting its grade calculations and student submissions.

descriptor.title: Create Grading Rubric
descriptor.doc: Establishes a structured scoring tool for an assignment, defining the dimensions and performance levels for evaluation.

descriptor.title: Submit Assignment
descriptor.doc: Records a student's response to an evaluation activity, capturing their work for instructor review and grading.

descriptor.title: Grade Submission
descriptor.doc: Evaluates a student's assignment response, assigning a score and potentially providing explanatory feedback.

descriptor.title: Provide Feedback
descriptor.doc: Adds or updates instructional comments on a student's work, offering guidance without necessarily changing the grade.

descriptor.title: Export Grades
descriptor.doc: Generates a downloadable file containing student scores for a course, formatted for use in external systems.

descriptor.title: Calculate Overall Grades
descriptor.doc: Computes final course grades by applying weightings to individual assignment scores according to the grading scheme.

descriptor.title: Create Discussion
descriptor.doc: Establishes a new conversation forum within a course, defining its topic and initial prompt for participation.

descriptor.title: Create Discussion Post
descriptor.doc: Adds a new message to a conversation forum, initiating a thread or starting a new topic for discussion.

descriptor.title: Reply to Post
descriptor.doc: Adds a response to an existing message in a conversation forum, continuing the thread of discussion.

descriptor.title: Create Announcement
descriptor.doc: Broadcasts a system message to all participants in a course, notifying them of important information or updates.

descriptor.title: Reply to Message
descriptor.doc: Responds to a personal communication from another user, continuing the private conversation thread.

descriptor.title: Attach File to Message
descriptor.doc: Includes a document or media resource with a personal communication, making it available to the recipient.

descriptor.title: Create Student Group
descriptor.doc: Establishes a new team of students within a course, defining its membership and collaborative workspace.

descriptor.title: Update Group
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing student team's details or settings while maintaining its identity and workspace.

descriptor.title: Delete Group
descriptor.doc: Removes a student team from a course, potentially affecting collaborative assignments and workspace access.

descriptor.title: Add Group Member
descriptor.doc: Includes an additional student in an existing team, granting them access to its collaborative workspace.

descriptor.title: Remove Group Member
descriptor.doc: Excludes a student from a team, revoking their access to its collaborative workspace and activities.

descriptor.title: Create Webinar
descriptor.doc: Schedules a new live session for a course, establishing its timing, access details, and topic.

descriptor.title: Update Webinar
descriptor.doc: Modifies an existing live session's details, timing, or access information while maintaining its identity.

descriptor.title: Delete Webinar
descriptor.doc: Cancels a planned live session, removing it from the course schedule and notifying potential participants.

descriptor.title: Join Webinar
descriptor.doc: Connects a user to an active live session, enabling their real-time participation through video, audio, or chat.

descriptor.title: View Webinar Recording
descriptor.doc: Directs the user to the playback interface for a captured live session, allowing asynchronous viewing.

descriptor.title: Filter Analytics Data
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed engagement and performance metrics to focus on specific timeframes or aspects.

descriptor.title: Export Analytics Data
descriptor.doc: Generates a downloadable file containing engagement and performance metrics for a course, formatted for external analysis.

descriptor.title: Generate System Report
descriptor.doc: Creates a new data compilation based on specified parameters, processing system information for institutional analysis.

descriptor.title: Export Report Data
descriptor.doc: Generates a downloadable file containing report information, formatted for use in external systems or presentations.

descriptor.title: Filter Course List
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed courses to show only those matching specific criteria for more targeted browsing.

descriptor.title: Filter Student List
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed students to show only those matching specific criteria for focused monitoring.

descriptor.title: Filter Assignment List
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed assignments to show only those matching specific criteria for targeted management.

descriptor.title: Filter Submission List
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed student responses to show only those matching specific status criteria for focused grading.

descriptor.title: Filter Discussion List
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed conversation forums to show only those matching specific criteria for targeted participation.

descriptor.title: Filter Messages
descriptor.doc: Adjusts the parameters of displayed personal communications to show only those matching specific senders or dates for focused review.

descriptor.title: Update User Profile
descriptor.doc: Modifies a user's personal information or system preferences while maintaining their account identity and history.

descriptor.title: Create User
descriptor.doc: Establishes a new account in the system, defining the user's identity, contact information, and access permissions.

descriptor.title: Update User
descriptor.doc: Administratively modifies a user's account details or permissions while preserving their identity and history.

descriptor.title: Delete User
descriptor.doc: Removes a user account from the active system, potentially preserving their data for record-keeping or compliance.

descriptor.title: Update Settings
descriptor.doc: Modifies a user's system configuration preferences, including interface language, notifications, and accessibility accommodations.

descriptor.title: Download Content for Offline Access
descriptor.doc: Saves course materials to a mobile device's local storage, making them available for review without an active internet connection.

descriptor.title: Enable Mobile Notifications
descriptor.doc: Configures a mobile device to receive system alerts as push notifications, even when the application is not actively open.
